document_data.mainbody:
mmers whose use was intended as tools included [[sledgehammer]]s, peg- and tone-setting mallets, spike and chisel hammers, hammers with claws for nail removal, and smithing hammers.

Smithing hammers, in particular, consisted of solid and heavy flat-nosed steel heads with triangular tails to allow for detailed work, attached to a long [[Duskwood (tree)|duskwood]] handle that provided effective thermal isolation.

Several varieties of hammers were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

===Types of Hammers===
Hammers generally intended for use as weapons included:
* [[Gnome hooked hammer]]
* [[Light hammer]]
* [[Lucerne hammer]]
* [[Maul]]
* [[Throwing hammer]]
* [[Warhammer]]

Hammers designed for practical use as tools included:
* [[Cording mallet]]
* [[Cross-pein hammer]]
* [[Doming hammer]]
* [[Mallet]]
* [[Raising hammer]]
* [[Sledgehammer]]
